description: Contains information about Hospice Item Sets, such as the status, reason for record, and version.

columns.name: DATASET_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the data set record.

columns.name: DATASET_NAME
columns.description: The name of the dataset, formatted as the patient's name and the reason for record.

columns.name: INSTANT_NOADD_EDIT_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time that data that is not specific to a contact was edited for a data set.

columns.name: NOADD_ITEMS_EDITED
columns.description: Data that is not specific to a contact that was edited for a data set.

columns.name: DATASET_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item contains the current submission status of the Hospice Item Set.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


New


Visit Complete


Marked for Submission


Submitted


Accepted


Rejected


Voided


In Progress


Ready for 3rd Party


Sent to 3rd Party

columns.name: DATASET_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores what type of dataset the record is. Currently datasets can be OASIS or HIS.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


OASIS Dataset


HIS Dataset

columns.name: HIS_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the reason for record (e.g. Admission or Discharge) of the HIS Dataset. This corresponds to item A0250 on the Hospice Item Set. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Admission


Discharge

columns.name: HIS_VERSION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Version of Hospice Item Set to use.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


1.00


2.00


3.00

columns.name: HIS_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the hospice episode of care record associated with an HIS data set record.
